definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)

sentences.english: Idealized research methods to solve the historiography of measurement was first crisis.
sentences.chinese: 理想化的研究方法首先解決了計量史學的危機。

sentences.english: The idea of bringing revolution to the countryside had turned out to be a fantasy.
sentences.chinese: 改造農村的革命理想成了虛妄的幻想。

sentences.english: Ideally, every key value in the index is unique.
sentences.chinese: 理想情況是，索引中的每個鍵值都是惟一的。

sentences.english: If your dream is to destroy the world, that is the great evil.
sentences.chinese: 而如果你的理想是毀滅世界，那纔是大惡。

sentences.english: Your orgasms may not seem like the idealized one described here.
sentences.chinese: 你的高潮可能似乎不像這裏的理想描述。

sentences.english: My ideal match is a woman with a good sense of family.
sentences.chinese: 我的理想對象是要有好的家庭觀。

sentences.english: Any deviation from this ideal must be penalized to the extent of the deviation.
sentences.chinese: 任何偏離這個理想，必須扣分的偏差程度。

sentences.english: S is a nil-extension of strong semilattice of right semigroup.
sentences.chinese: 爲右羣強半格的詣零理想擴張。

sentences.english: And, of course, get down to your ideal body weight.
sentences.chinese: 最後，當然還有減至理想體重。

sentences.english: Both attended private schools and pursued their respective passions.
sentences.chinese: 他們都進私立學校，並追求自己的理想。

sentences.english: They decided that the establishment of a separate society founded on Nazi principles of genetic purity was the answer.
sentences.chinese: 這答案是建立一純正的納粹理想的亞利安社會。

sentences.english: White on the feet is desired but must not extend higher than the pasterns.
sentences.chinese: 白色足爪比較理想，但白色不能延伸到腳腕。

sentences.english: Explained Bazheng Powder the addition and subtraction treatment urine road stone effect to be ideal.
sentences.chinese: 說明八正散加減治療尿路結石效果理想。

sentences.english: In order to achieve the teaching ideal, he founded the Fuxing (renaturation ) College.
sentences.chinese: 爲了實現自己的教學理想，馬一浮創辦了復性書院。

sentences.english: The morning session of the seminar was not well attended.
sentences.chinese: 這個研討會的晨會出席狀況不甚理想。

sentences.english: It is an ideal introduction to his music. MBe
sentences.chinese: 這是對他的音樂的最理想的推介。
